Exercise Øving

The area of the triangle with vertices at the points with coordinates \(({@a1@},2,{@a3@})\), \(({@b1@},-3,{@b3@})\) and \(({@c1@},1,{@c3@})\) is: Arealet av trekanten med kanter i punktene \(({@a1@},2,{@a3@})\), \(({@b1@},-3,{@b3@})\) og \(({@c1@},1,{@c3@})\) er:

[[input:ans1]] units\(^2\) (please give your answer to one decimal place). enheter\(^2\) (vennligst gi svaret med én desimal). [[validation:ans1]][[feedback:prt1]]

generalfeedback.text:
As you checked in a previous example, the area of a triangle \(A_T\) defined by 3 points \(A\), \(B\) and \(C\) is given by: \(A_T = \dfrac{1}{2}|\overrightarrow{AB}\times \overrightarrow{AC}|\). If we define  \(A=({@a1@},2,{@a3@})\), \(B=({@b1@},-3,{@b3@})\) and \(C=({@c1@},1,{@c3@})\), then, we have that \( \overrightarrow{AB} = {@b1-a1@} \underline{i} -5\underline{j} + {@b3-a3@}\underline{k} \) and \( \overrightarrow{AC} = {@c1-a1@} \underline{i} -\underline{j} + {@c3-a3@}\underline{k} \), thus: Som du sjekket i et tidligere eksempel, er arealet av en trekant \(A_T\) definert av 3 punkter \(A\), \(B\) og \(C\) gitt av: \(A_T = \dfrac{1}{2}|\overrightarrow{AB}\times \overrightarrow{AC}|\). Hvis vi definerer  \(A=({@a1@},2,{@a3@})\), \(B=({@b1@},-3,{@b3@}) \) og \(C=({@c1@},1,{@c3@})\), så har vi at \( \overrightarrow{AB} = {@b1-a1@} \underline{i} -5\underline{j} + {@b3-a3@}\underline{k} \) og \( \overrightarrow{AC} = {@c1-a1@} \underline{i } -\underline{j} + {@c3-a3@}\underline{k} \), altså:

\(\begin{aligned} \overrightarrow{AB}\times \overrightarrow{AC} &= \left| \begin{matrix} \underline{i} & \underline{j} & \underline{k} \\ {@b1-a1@} & -5 & {@b3-a3@} \\ {@c1-a1@} & -1 & {@c3-a3@} \\ \end{matrix} \right| \\ & = \underline{i}((-5)({@c3-a3@})-({@b3-a3@})(-1)) - \underline{j}(({@b1-a1@})({@c3-a3@})-({@b3-a3@})({@c1-a1@})) + \underline{k}(({@b1-a1@})(-1)-(-5)({@c1-a1@})) \\ & =  {@4*a3 +b3 -5*c3@}\underline{i}-({@(b1-a1)*(c3-a3) - (c1-a1)*(b3-a3)@})\underline{j} +({@5*c1 -b1 -4*a1@})\underline{k} \end{aligned}\).

Thus: Så:

\( A_T = \dfrac{1}{2}|\overrightarrow{AB}\times \overrightarrow{AC}| = \dfrac{1}{2} \sqrt{({@4*a3 +b3 -5*c3@})^2 + (-({@(b1-a1)*(c3-a3) - (c1-a1)*(b3-a3)@}))^2 + ({@5*c1 -b1 -4*a1@})^2} = {@ta@}  \)

In conclusion,the area of the triangle with vertices at the points with coordinates \(({@a1@},2,{@a3@})\), \(({@b1@},-3,{@b3@})\) and \(({@c1@},1,{@c3@})\) is {@ta@} units\(^2\). I konklusjon, er arealet av trekanten med kanter i punktene med koordinatene \(({@a1@},2,{@a3@})\), \(({@b1@},-3,{@b3 @})\) og \(({@c1@},1,{@c3@})\) lik {@ta@} enheter\(^2\).
